intro: Myosotis lyallii, commonly known as the New Zealand forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It is characterized by its small, delicate blue or purple flowers and heart-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and wetlands. It belongs to the Primulaceae family and is known for its ornamental value. Myosotis lyallii is also valued for its ecological role in supporting local pollinators.
